finalproject

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • finalproject.Projectile

  • public class Projectile
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(double dy,
          double dx)

    • Method Detail

      • moveProj

        public void moveProj()
        Moves the projectile by updating its current location. Movement is based on its current location and the X and Y velocities.

      • projImage

        public javalib.worldimages.WorldImage projImage()
        Draws the image of the projectile.

      • hitWall

        public void hitWall()
        Determines if the projectile has hit a wall. If a side wall is hit, the x velocity is negated. If a top or bottom wall is hit, the y velocity is negated.

      • hitPlatform

        public void hitPlatform(javalib.worldimages.Posn pos)
        Determines if the projectile has hit a platform. If the side of the platform is hit, the x velocity is negated. If the top or bottom of the platform is hit, the y velocity is negated.
